casebody.data:
[Belknap,

December, 1879.] Perley v. B. C. & M. R. R. Pike Parsons and Copeland, for the plaintiff. Mugridge, Whipple, Jewell, and Barnard 8f Barnard, for the defendants. *594Dob, C. J.

The plaintiff does not attempt to sustain any of his exceptions; and we see no cause for a new trial.

Judgment for the defendants.'

Bingham, Smith, and Clark, JJ., did not sit: tbe others concurred.
